name: Sea Defence
description:
You play as Rani, a random girl who want to protect her country sea area. Help her by destroying enemies that come to her.
Rani have weapons so you can destroy enemy with it.

Complete 5 available stage, destroy the bosses and see the ending!

Android Requirements:
Android 2.3 or above
And any device that support OpenGL ES 2.0

-----------------------------------

Currently this game development is on hold.
Means that the development is paused until further notice.
You can read the explanation here.
TL;DR
For this project we will need community donation to further the development.
If anyone still want to support this project we will happily resume it.
You can read the donation usage and detail here.
We also setting up rewards for you donators, so that your donation is not in vain.

So that's it.
Thanks for your support!
